title: Rodney Brooks and Darrell Cavens
teaser: Host Jessica Harris talks with Rodney Brooks, the co-founder of Rethink Robotics.. Harris also talks with Darrell Cavens, co-founder of Zulily.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris talks with Rodney Brooks and Darrell Cavens
